{(function execute() {

 //Buyer Finance Support Queue Id (AWA queue)
 vaVars.LiveAgent_queue = 'ea021f2507209010c6acf7d08c1ed0ca';

 gs.info('Live Agent Available : [' + vaSystem.isLiveAgentAvailable() + ']');
 
 if(vaSystem.isLiveAgentAvailable()){
 gs.info('Attempting to connect to available agents...');
 vaSystem.connectToAgent();
 }else{
 gs.info('No Agent Available - .');
 var multiOutMsg = new sn_cs.MultiPartOutMsg();
 multiOutMsg.addPlainTextPart('Sorry, No agents are available right away. Please try again later.');
 return multiOutMsg;
 }
 
})()
